name: MEM_TEMP_ABOVE_THRESHOLD
description: DSC memory temperature is above the critical threshold. System performance may be degraded

name: MEM_TEMP_BELOW_THRESHOLD
description: DSC memory temperature has fallen below the critical threshold

name: NAPLES_CATTRIP_INTERRUPT
description: DSC temperature crossed the fatal threshold and cattrip is triggered, resetting the system

name: NAPLES_PANIC
description: DSC panic occurred on previous boot

name: NAPLES_INFO_PCIEHEALTH_EVENT
description: DSC has detected a pcie link health event

name: NAPLES_WARN_PCIEHEALTH_EVENT
description: DSC has detected a pcie link health warning

name: NAPLES_ERR_PCIEHEALTH_EVENT
description: DSC has detected a pcie link health error

name: DSC_MEM_PARTITION_USAGE_ABOVE_THRESHOLD
description: Memory usage of the partition is above threshold percentage

name: DSC_MEM_PARTITION_USAGE_BELOW_THRESHOLD
description: Memory usage of the partition is below threshold percentage
